document_data.name: Xian
document_data.mainbody: '''Xian''' was a stretch of badlands located in the south of [[Nathlan]] in the [[Shining Plains]].{{Cite dragon/378/Playing Githzerai|81}}
document_data.Geography: The badlands were located southeast of the [[Giant's Run Mountains]] and north of the [[Snowflake Mountains]] in the west of the Shining Plains region.
document_data.History:
Xian was created following the [[Spellplague]] of the {{YearlinkName|1385}}, and the subsequent opening of the [[Land's Mouth]] chasm to the northwest and the creation of the [[Vilhon Wilds]] to the south.

By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], a group of [[githzerai]] had taken up residence in the region and were hoping to ignite conflict between the [[mind flayer]]s of [[Oryndoll]] and the [[githyanki]] of [[Gatchorof]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Karokrath]], a large secret stronghold of githzerai.
* [[Oryndoll]], a mind flayer city located in the [[Underdark]] {{SI|26|miles|k|long=yes}} below the surfance.
